mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Result ( logicScore, claScore, totalScore, interviewId, suggestion, allEval, impAnswer, simScore ) VALUES ( #{logicScore}, #{claScore}, #{totalScore}, #{interviewId}, #{suggestion}, #{allEval}, #{impAnswer}, #{simScore} )
mapper.select: SELECT resultId, logicScore, simScore, claScore, totalScore, createdAt, interviewId, suggestion, allEval, impAnswer FROM Result WHERE interviewId = #{interviewId}
